title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Install and initial configuration NeoFly and NeoPad
description:
Always dreamed about a career as pilot? In that case you should definitely looks at NeoFly which adds a career mode to MSFS 2020.
NeoFly is regularly updated with new missions in a wide variety of categories. 
In this video we will look at the initial setup of NeoFly and in addition at NeoPad which is a nice addition to NeoFly to track your flight progress.

The content used in this video can be found on the following site:

https://www.neofly.net/
